add_library(externLibADIDatIO SHARED IMPORTED GLOBAL)
set_target_properties(externLibADIDatIO PROPERTIES
	INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include/"
	IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/ADIDatIOWin.dll"
	IMPORTED_IMPLIB "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/ADIDatIOWin.lib"
)
file(COPY ADIDatIOWin.dll
		DESTINATION "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/bin/")
